content:
> When your house is on fire you don’t wait to see if it goes out by itself, you call 999 straight away.

-- @arseblog on Arsenal's inaction over Centre Back injuries. Clearly negligent to start the season so unprepared.
summary: "When your house is on fire you don’t wait to see if it goes out by itself, you call 999" @arseblog on #AFC inaction http://arseblog.com/2016/08/arsenal-3-4-liverpool-chickens-indecision-prevarication-come-home-roost/
